languages.text: Связывает Скоморох Блефа и Кристалических големов. За каждого живого Кристолического голема, Скоморох Блеф получает стаки {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}Parasitism{/g}. Действует пока Скульптор жив.

traits.locale_text: Связывает Скоморох Блефа и Кристалических големов. За каждого живого Кристолического голема, Скоморох Блеф получает стаки {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}Parasitism{/g}. Действует пока Скульптор жив.

languages.text: While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.
languages.original_text: Пока Тавриск жив, Блеф получает +1 уровень {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}уз служения{/g} за каждого каменного стража в строю.

traits.locale_text: While Tavrisk is alive, buffoon Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of service{/g} for each stone guard still in combat.
While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.
While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.

languages.text: Kurusıkı, Tavrisk hayattayken hâlâ çatışmada bulunan her taş nöbetçi için +1 {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}hizmetkârlık bağları{/g} birikimi kazanır.
languages.original_text: While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Kurusıkı, Tavrisk hayattayken hâlâ çatışmada bulunan her taş nöbetçi için +1 {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}hizmetkârlık bağları{/g} birikimi kazanır.

languages.text: Mientras Tavrisk esté vivo, Farol gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}lazos de servidumbre{/g} por cada centinela de piedra que aún siga en el combate.
languages.original_text: While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Mientras Tavrisk esté vivo, Farol gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}lazos de servidumbre{/g} por cada centinela de piedra que aún siga en el combate.

languages.text: 只要塔夫瑞克还活着，战场上每有一只存活的坚石哨卫，闹闹就获得1层{g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}奴役枷锁{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.

traits.locale_text: 只要塔夫瑞克还活着，战场上每有一只存活的坚石哨卫，闹闹就获得1层{g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}奴役枷锁{/g}效果。

languages.text: Tant que Tavrisk est en vie, Bluff gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}Liens de la servitude{/g} par sentinelle de pierre présente sur le champ de bataille.
languages.original_text: While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.

traits.locale_text: Tant que Tavrisk est en vie, Bluff gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}Liens de la servitude{/g} par sentinelle de pierre présente sur le champ de bataille.

languages.text: タヴリスクが生きている間、ブラフは戦闘に残っているストーンセンチネルにつき+1スタックの{g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}奴隷の絆{/g}を付与される。
languages.original_text: While Tavrisk is alive, Bluff gains +1 stack of {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}bonds of servitude{/g} for each stone sentinel still in combat.

traits.locale_text: タヴリスクが生きている間、ブラフは戦闘に残っているストーンセンチネルにつき+1スタックの{g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}奴隷の絆{/g}を付与される。

languages.text: Solange Tavrisk lebt, erhält Bluff +1 Stapel {g|f:8e056b164f3b4a17b03b1d7565cc558e}Bande der Knechtschaft{/g} für jeden im Kampf befindlichen Steinwächter.
